title: The Dreamer Volume 3: The Battle of Harlem Heights
description: Bea Whaley's vivid dreams about the American Revolution continue in this all-new graphic novel! In the 21st Century Bea's friends and family begin to suspect that something is wrong, but Bea knows she cannot tell them about her dreams. As tensions rise, she struggles to return to the 18th century, where her friends' lives are threatened by the ever growing war -- and this time, she just might be too late to save them.
author: Lora Innes
